title: Reports - After reset app, expense row does not show negative sign on Reports > Expenses

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: Help Wanted
labels.description: Apply this label when an issue is open to proposals by contributors

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
If you havenâ€™t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel!
___

**Version Number:** 9.2.28-1
**Reproducible in staging?:** Yes
**Reproducible in production?:** N/A - new feature, doesn't exist in prod
**If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/65001
**Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** jsdoijnsondijodjnsoj@gmail.com
**Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team
**Device used:** Mac 15.5 / Chrome
**App Component:** Search

## Action Performed:
1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com
2. Go to workspace chat.
3. Create an expense with negative amount in workspace chat.
4. Go to Account > Troubleshoot > Clear cache and restart > Reset and refresh.
5. Go to Reports > Expenses.

## Expected Result:
After reset app, expense row will show the negative amount on Reports > Expenses.

## Actual Result:
After reset app, expense row does not show the negative amount on Reports > Expenses. It appears as positive amount.

## Workaround:
Unknown

## Platforms:
- [x] Android: App
- [x] Android: mWeb Chrome
- [x] iOS: App
- [x] iOS: mWeb Safari
- [x] iOS: mWeb Chrome
- [x] Windows: Chrome
- [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari
- [x] MacOS: Desktop

## Screenshots/Videos

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e23cc7d6-3ff8-4957-8d89-ae01421ed5b0

labels.name: External

body:
If you havenâ€™t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.28-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://test-management.browserstack.com/projects/2219752/test-runs/TR-1221/folder/18717689/49855697/941909022 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** sjodinsoijsoisjo@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Device used:** Mac 15.5 / Chrome **App Component:** Money Requests ## Action Performed: Precondition: - Account has self DM. 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com 2. Go to self DM. 3. Click + > Track distance > Manual. 4. Enter amount > Next. 5. On confirm page, click Rate. 6. Click Upgrade > Got it, thanks. 7. Enter a rate and click Save. 8. On confirm page, click RHP back button. 9. Click RHP back button. ## Expected Result: RHP should close. ## Actual Result: RHP reopens Add rate page. Then, back button reopens confirm page which reopens amount page again. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: App - [x] iOS: mWeb Safari - [x] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [x] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e48e68e4-ed3e-4411-82ba-5d8dce3683c7 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)
